quote_first: They were hurrying west, trying to reach the river before sunset. The warming-related “adjustments” to Earth’s orbit had shortened the winter days, so that now, in January, sunset was taking place at
title: A Visit from the Goon Squad
author: Jennifer Egan

quote_last: After stowing their bags in the sleeping quarters below, the two new itinerant deckhands reported for duty on the main deck.
title: Nothing Ventured
author: Jeffrey Archer
